overview:
Keith Ritter runs a consulting firm in Westport. CT. The practice focuses on media, both traditional and digital. He works with companies of all sizes and has a track record of success with early- and mid-stage businesses.

For nearly seven years, Keith guided the digital businesses of the National Hockey League, including NHL.com, the NHL.com Network, NHL Wireless, the League’s online and catalog commerce programs and data and content licensing. He negotiated groundbreaking agreements for monetization of NHL content with AOL, MSN, Yahoo, Sympatico, YouTube, Joost, Sling, Apple, and others. Prior to that, Keith spent nearly 25 years with ABC and CBS in sales and marketing, particularly in the sports divisions.
